document_data.name: Suhailah al-Hawai
document_data.mainbody: '''Suhailah al-Hawai''' was a minor member of the [[Corsair Council]] of [[Hawa]].
document_data.Description: Suhailah was sturdy like most [[Dwarf|dwarves]] and possessed blue eyes and brown hair.
document_data.Personality: Her acidic tongue earned her fame, or infamy, throughout Hawa. She was happiest while on her ships and enjoyed working on them instead of sitting in on boring meetings.
document_data.Abilities: A long career as a smuggler provided Suhailah with plenty of skills common to most rogues. She possessed a keen intellect, which translated well regarding ship improvements for speed and design.
document_data.Activities: A minor member of the council, Suhailah was typically too busy to attend meetings.
